channel.title: Help with ::buy
channel.description:
Before all the flaming starts - i tried searching for the last hour, search either returns no results or the same thread which just gives me an error..
I'm using the ::buy command from n00bscape for EasyRSC. Currently, all players can use ::buy, which is what i want. However, i only want them to be able to buy Runes and Arrows in mass quantities, so they don't sit and click away for hours on end. I don't want them to be able to buy anything else. How would i change the command so there is only an array of items they can buy, instead of anything?
Help would be much appreciated. Thanks in advance, any help would be appreciated.
